DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Finding Present Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the disease or disorder finding.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Clinical manifestations that can be either objective when observed by a physician, or subjective when perceived by the patient.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: .11/8/12mn-Concept definition change in NCIt for 'Finding C3376' Was: Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examining physician (sign) and subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient (symptom). Now: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease. no version change needed.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.
